audioText: Vous vous couchez généralement vers dix heures du soir pour respecter un rythme de sommeil régulier essentiel à votre bien-être.
question: When do you usually go to bed?
options: Around ten o'clock in the evening to maintain a regular sleep rhythm essential for well-being
Very late after finishing all daily tasks and responsibilities
Early in the afternoon to compensate for morning work shifts
At different times depending on social activities and commitments
explanation: The text states 'Vous vous couchez généralement vers dix heures du soir pour respecter un rythme de sommeil régulier essentiel à votre bien-être.' - You usually go to bed around ten o'clock in the evening to respect a regular sleep rhythm essential to your well-being. 'Couchez' is the second person plural present form of 'se coucher' (to go to bed).
